Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 14th overall pick, by San Francisco in 2015...
Had first career hit (homerun) on 4/4/2015, off James Borden (DET)...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/14/2015, hitting .647 with 0 HR, 5 RBI...
Injured on 9/23/2015 with a Pulled Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/26/2016, hitting .591 with 1 HR, 5 RBI...
Traded from San Francisco to Philadelphia on 2/1/2017 (Going to SF: LF Donald Lamberth, 3B Asa Kelemen, RF Fred Bondurant. Going to PHI: RF Manuel Cambra)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Cincinnati on 4/7/2017...
Had 5 hits with 3 RBI against St. Louis (C) on 5/3/2017...
Drove in 6 runs against Colorado on 4/5/2018...
Was selected to the 2018 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cincinnati on 2/1/2019 to a 5-year deal worth $10,500,750 per year...
Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/3/2019, hitting .438 with 3 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2019, hitting .346 with 5 HR, 13 RBI...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2019...
Won MVP in 2019, hitting .300 with 32 HR, 120 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 6/12/2020, hitting .464 with 2 HR, 13 RBI...
Was selected to the 2020 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/4/2020, hitting .421 with 2 HR, 7 RBI...
Won World Series with Cincinnati in 2020...
Won MVP in 2020, hitting .314 with 25 HR, 121 RBI...
Traded from Cincinnati to Montreal on 2/4/2023 (Going to CIN: P Donnie Kopp, CF James Ostrowski, P Philip Lund, CF Hector Huerta, 1B Darrell Coleman. Going to MON: P Matthew Gordillo, RF Patricio
Garza, 1B Manuel Cambra, RF Troy Burrier)...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/8/2024 to a 4-year deal worth $15,000,000 per year...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/28/2024, hitting .480 with 3 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 9/1/2024, hitting .317 with 7 HR, 21 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2024, hitting .529 with 2 HR, 4 RBI...
Was selected to the 2026 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2026, hitting .478 with 4 HR, 11 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2026, hitting .349 with 9 HR, 28 RBI...
Injured on 8/30/2026 with a Stiff Knee, out for one week...
Won Player of the Week award on 10/2/2026, hitting .333 with 4 HR, 9 RBI...
Won MVP in 2026, hitting .307 with 32 HR, 108 RBI...
Traded from Brooklyn to Cincinnati on 3/2/2027 (Going to CIN: DH Manuel Cambra, CF Carl Porter, C Harold Lowe, P Nestor Cortes, P Tony Arenas. Going to BRO: 1B Manuel Rodarte, LF Glenn Chancey, P
Asdrubal Perez, P Celso Gurrola)...
Injured on 5/2/2027 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for one week...
Won Batter of the Month award on 8/1/2027, hitting .330 with 7 HR, 28 RBI...
8/19/2027: Signed a contract extension with Cincinnati, $17,000,000 per year, for 1 years.
Had 2000th career hit on 8/27/2027, off Ryan Benjamin (SLB)...
